message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice,  $20,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $13,000 at this time. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $13,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm looking for. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $17,000 is still a little higher than my budget.  How about we split the difference and settle on $16,000?
